title: TIRA paper upgraded to Oral at NeurIPS-W 2025
text: Our paper 'The Unseen Hand Manipulating Model Fairness and SHAP with Targeted Identity Re-Association Attacks' has been upgraded to an Oral. The work has also been selected for presentation at the AE Joint Poster Session at NeurIPS.

title: The Unseen Hand: Targeted Identity Re-Association Attacks accepted at NeurIPS-W 2025
text: Our work 'The Unseen Hand Manipulating Model Fairness and SHAP with Targeted Identity Re-Association Attacks' has been accepted into NeurIPS 2025 Workshop.

title: Training-Time Explainability accepted at NeurIPS-W 2025
text: Our collaboration with TU Dublin titled "Training-Time Explainability for Multilingual Hate Speech Detection: Aligning Model Reasoning with Human Rationales" has been accepted into NeurIPS 2025 workshop.

title: Best Paper Explanation Award
text: We have been awarded the Best Paper Explanation Award for our presentation Anthropic's 'On the Biology of a Large Language Model'.
